comments: This is the third case in which the treating physician is asked to also serve in a triage function related to other patients.  Most allocation protocols d-- as exemplified during COVID in US at least -- separated these roles as incompatible. i'd be interested in hearing from others about whether this is something that is different in value-based, public-health oriented systems with less of an individualized expecation as in the US to determine keeping or modifying these cases ... or not.
